people_also_ask.question: Why is Dragon Quest VIII so good?
people_also_ask.heading: A fun world with memorable characters who are easy to like. More accessible than other Dragon Quest games, but the difficulty curve is still acceptably steep for people who want a challenge. Solid voice acting. Nice graphics for the 3DS, though they aren't much of a departure from the PS2 original.A fun world with memorable characters who are easy to like. More accessible than other Dragon Quest games, but the difficulty curve is still acceptably steep for people who want a challenge. Solid voice acting. columns: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King

attributes.value: japanese role-playing game, adventure game, strategy video game

knowledge_panel.description: dragon quest viii: journey of the cursed king is a role-playing video game developed by level-5 and published by square enix for the playstation 2. it was released in japan in 2004, in north america in 2005 and pal regions in 2006, making it the first main series installment released in the pal region. wikipedia
